mapper.select: select refund_id, cost_id, refund_comment, refund_status, created_at, updated_at from refund where created_at >= now() - interval 1 month

select A.refund_id, A.cost_id, A.refund_comment, A.refund_status, A.created_at, A.updated_at from refund A join academyCost B on A.user_id = B.user_id where B.user_id = #{userId} AND A.created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 MONTH
